Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: SNOMEDCTMorphologicAbnormalities
Title: SNOMED CT Morphologic Abnormalities
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus

Name: DataAbsentReason

Name: DiagnosticReportStatus

Name: DiagnosticServiceSectionCodes

Descriptino: This value set includes all the codes in HL7 V2 table 0074.

Name: CommonLanguages

Name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes

Name: ObservationCategoryCodes
Title: Observation Category Codes
Descriptino: Observation Category codes.

Name: LOINCCodes
Title: LOINC Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all LOINC codes

Name: ObservationInterpretationCodes
Title: Observation Interpretation Codes
Descriptino: A categorical assessment, providing a rough qualitative interpretation of the observation value,    such as “normal”/ “abnormal”,”low” / “high”, “better” / “worse”, “susceptible” / “resistant”, “expected”/ “not expected”.    The value set is intended to be for ANY use where coded representation of an interpretation is needed.             Notes:          This is being communicated in v2.x in OBX-8 (Observation Interpretation), in v3 in ObservationInterpretation (CWE) in R1 (Representative Realm) and in FHIR in    Observation.interpretation. Historically these values come from the laboratory domain, and these codes are extensively    used. The value set binding is extensible, so codes outside the value set that are needed for interpretation concepts    (i.e. particular meanings) that are not included in the value set can be used, and these new codes may also be added to    the value set and published in a future version.

Name: ObservationMethods
Title: Observation Methods
Descriptino: Observation Method codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 272394005 (Technique (qualifier value)) or is-a 129264002 (Action (qualifier value)) or is-a 386053000 (Evaluation procedure(procedure))

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: ObservationStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status of an observation.

Name: QuantityComparator
Title: QuantityComparator
Descriptino: How the Quantity should be understood and represented.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeAppliesToCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Applies To Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeMeaningCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Meaning Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range for a particular target population.

Name: LOINCDiagnosticReportCodes
Title: LOINC Diagnostic Report Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes LOINC codes that relate to Diagnostic Observations.

Name: OphthalmologyBodySiteEye
Title: Ophthalmic anatomical location

Name: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison

Title: Pupil Function Confounders
Descriptino: ValueSet including codes that represent confounders due to pupil function that may affect visual acuity measurements.

Name: LensTypes
Title: Lens Types
Descriptino: This ValueSet includes all SNOMED CT codes that are descendants of 'Contact lenses, device' (57368009) and 'Eye glasses, device' (50121007).

Name: OphthalmologyVisualAcuityMethods
Title: Visual Acuity Measurement Methods valueset
Descriptino: Describes the various charts that can be used to assess visual acuity where concept descends from 400912000 (Visual acuity test equipment (physical object))

Name: OptotypePresentation
Title: Optotype Presentation ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet that includes codes representing the type of optotype presentation used during visual acuity testing.

Name: Optotypes
Title: Optotype ValueSet
Descriptino: A ValueSet that includes codes representing optotype used during visual acuity testing.

Name: PinholeOccluderUsage
Title: Pinhole Occluder Usage Values
Descriptino: This ValueSet contains SNOMED CT codes to represent whether a pinhole occluder was used during a visual acuity measurement.

Name: PupiTestingActiveSubstances

Name: ValueSet-right-left-both-eyes

Name: ValueSet-right-left-eyes

Name: VisualAcuityCorrectionMethods

Name: VisualAcuityTestDistance

Name: VisualAcuityQuantityUnits
